mosnterResistances: Damage Resistances bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monsterLanguages: Languages understands Ignan but can't speak
monsterSpecials: Heated Body. A creature that touches the snake or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.
monsterActions: Multiattack. The snake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.
Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
Tail. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
